Class LocationChunkUtility

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class LocationChunkUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    Class contains utility methods for the LocationChunk class

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int countTotalOverlappingTime(java.util.ArrayList<LocationChunk> usersChunks, java.util.ArrayList<LocationChunk> othersChunks)
      Method returns the number of seconds of companionship between two peoples LocationChunks
      static LocationChunk getCommonLocationChunk(LocationChunk firstChunk, LocationChunk secondChunk)
      Method returns a common LocationChunk between two LocationChunks based on the times found in both LocationChunks given.
      static java.util.ArrayList<LocationChunk> getLocationChunks(java.util.ArrayList<Location> locations, java.util.Date startWindow, java.util.Date endWindow)
      Method takes in a list of Location objects and returns a list of LocationChunks that represent a period of time a user spends at a location
      static java.util.ArrayList<LocationChunk> smoothChunksByLocationId(java.util.ArrayList<LocationChunk> chunks)
      This method smooths a list of chunks, if 2 subsequent chunks have the same LocationID, they will be merged into a single chunk
      static java.util.ArrayList<LocationChunk> smoothChunksBySemanticPlace(java.util.ArrayList<LocationChunk> chunks)
      This method smooths a list of chunks, if 2 subsequent chunks are a the same semantic place, they will be merged into one single chunk

    • Method Detail

      • getLocationChunks

        public static java.util.ArrayList<LocationChunk> getLocationChunks(java.util.ArrayList<Location> locations,
                                                                   java.util.Date startWindow,
                                                                   java.util.Date endWindow)
        Method takes in a list of Location objects and returns a list of LocationChunks that represent a period of time a user spends at a location
        Parameters:
        locations - list of Location objects to be processed
        startWindow - Date start time of the search period the list of locations where found in
        endWindow - Date end time of the search period the list of locations were found in
        Returns:
        list of LocationChunks sorted by increasing time

      • smoothChunksBySemanticPlace

        public static java.util.ArrayList<LocationChunk> smoothChunksBySemanticPlace(java.util.ArrayList<LocationChunk> chunks)
        This method smooths a list of chunks, if 2 subsequent chunks are a the same semantic place, they will be merged into one single chunk
        Parameters:
        chunks - list of LocationChunks to be smoothed
        Returns:
        list of merged chunks sorted by increasing time

      • smoothChunksByLocationId

        public static java.util.ArrayList<LocationChunk> smoothChunksByLocationId(java.util.ArrayList<LocationChunk> chunks)
        This method smooths a list of chunks, if 2 subsequent chunks have the same LocationID, they will be merged into a single chunk
        Parameters:
        chunks - list of chunks to be smoothed
        Returns:
        list of merged chunks sorted by increasing time

      • countTotalOverlappingTime

        public static int countTotalOverlappingTime(java.util.ArrayList<LocationChunk> usersChunks,
                                            java.util.ArrayList<LocationChunk> othersChunks)
        Method returns the number of seconds of companionship between two peoples LocationChunks
        Parameters:
        usersChunks -
        othersChunks -
        Returns:
        number of seconds of overlap between two lists of LocationChunks

      • getCommonLocationChunk

        public static LocationChunk getCommonLocationChunk(LocationChunk firstChunk,
                                                   LocationChunk secondChunk)
        Method returns a common LocationChunk between two LocationChunks based on the times found in both LocationChunks given.
        Parameters:
        firstChunk -
        secondChunk -
        Returns:
        LocationChunk if common time found, null if no common time
